phrs.translation: 腔内放射治疗, 胆道腔内放射治疗
肠腔压力, 血管压力

sentences.sentence: Systems and methods implant one or more fastening structure(s) (14) in a targeted body region, e. g. , within a hollow body organ or an intraluminal space.
sentences.translation: 本发明公开了将一个或多个紧固结构（14）植入身体目标区域内如 空心体器官或管腔内空间中的系统和方法。

sentences.sentence: Methods Thrombolysis of intraluminal urokinase infusion and percutaneous transluminal angioplasty (PTA) were performed respectively to treat 19 segments of 12 cases.
sentences.translation: 方法采用血管内尿激酶溶栓术和经皮穿刺血管成形术(PTA)治疗患者12例19段。

sentences.sentence: There were lobectomy in 10 cases, lung wedge resection in 3, excision of intraluminal tumor of bronchus in 3, exploratory thoracotomy in 2. Results: No operative death.
sentences.translation: 施行肺叶切除10例，楔形切除3例，支气管腔内肿瘤摘除3例，开胸探查2例，无手术死亡或住院死亡。
